download.title: Get Tools
download.subtitle: Download Google Antigravity, start your creative journey

card.title: Google Antigravity IDE
card.desc: AI Native Development Environment by Google DeepMind

warning.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important
warning.text_2: Please download from official channels to ensure security and get the latest Gemini 2.0 model support.

items.label: Confirm IDE Source
items.desc: Ensure you're downloading the official version

items.label: Prepare for Vision
items.desc: Think about the app you want to build

vision.title: Define Vision
vision.subtitle: Tell AI what you want. Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
vision.desc_text:
Open Antigravity IDE and type your ideas in the chat.
No jargon needed, just answer these questions:

target.title: Target
target.desc: What do you want to build?

sidebar.title: Current Progress

items.label: Define App Type
items.desc: What kind of app do you want to build?

items.label: Clarify Core Goal
items.desc: What problem does this app solve?

sidebar.why_desc: A clear vision is the start of everything. Describe your idea in everyday language, and AI will help organize your thoughts and ensure the right direction.

generator.title: Prompt Generator
generator.app_type_placeholder: e.g., Todo List, Pomodoro Timer, Blog
generator.goal_placeholder: e.g., Remind me to buy milk, Track study progress
generator.prompt_template:
I am developing some software. I'll share my ideas with you. Once you understand them, please completely restate them, and then provide a perfect implementation plan or solution. Just give me the approach, do not write code.

I want to build a: {{appType}}. I hope this software can solve: {{goal}}.

example.title: Conversation Example
example.user_text: I want to make a minimal todo list to remind me to buy milk, styled like sticky notes.
example.ai_response_text_1: You want a sticky-note styled minimal todo list.
example.ai_response_text_2: Great idea! Sticky note aesthetics add a fun touch. I suggest using yellow background cards with handwritten fonts, removing complex categories to keep it pure.

ai_cmd.title: AI Communication Command
ai_cmd.desc: Copy this command to AI to get professional advice:
ai_cmd.text: Please provide reasonable suggestions for my requirements. In your reply, you should offer a reasonable plan that does not involve technical details. If you have no questions, we will proceed to the next step.

generation.title: Code Synthesis
generation.subtitle: Witness magic. Let AI turn your thoughts into reality.

steps.title: Integrate Prompt
steps.desc: Combine your original vision with the 'Understanding + Suggestions' from step 2 into a complete prompt block.

steps.title: Send to Antigravity
steps.desc: Paste this prompt block into the IDE chat and press Enter.

steps.title: Wait for Creation
steps.desc: AI will automatically plan the file structure and write code. Watch the progress bar until 'Task Completed'.

coffee_break.title: Grab a Coffee
coffee_break.desc:
Depending on complexity, this may take a few minutes.
You can use this time to sign up for accounts needed in the next step.

ai_cmd.title: AI Generation Command
ai_cmd.desc: Copy the command below to AI to start your magical journey:
ai_cmd.text: Please help me merge the vision from my ideas with your previous suggestions and start writing code. Please ensure the latest React and CSS tech stack is used.

items.label: Confirm Final Prompt
items.desc: Ensure AI understands all your requirements

items.label: Send and Monitor
items.desc: Start the creation process in Antigravity

items.label: Enjoy the Results
items.desc: Get ready to see your app in the browser

cloudflare.title: Global Deploy
cloudflare.subtitle: Sign up for Cloudflare and push your site to the global edge network

1.title: Create Account
1.desc: Cloudflare is the leading global edge network. We will use it to host your site for free with enterprise-grade speed.

2.title: Get API Token
2.desc: To let AI deploy automatically, you need to generate an API Token:
list: Click user icon top right ‚Üí <0>My Profile</0>
Scroll to bottom and click <0>Create Token</0>

3.title: AI Deploy Command
3.desc: Copy the command below to AI to complete deployment:
3.text: Please install npm dependencies locally, push to Cloudflare Pages after build, and return the clickable website link.

warning.title: üîë Important: Save your Token
warning.text_2:
Please copy it to a safe place (Notes/Password Manager) immediately.
You will need it in the next step.

items.label: Get API Token
items.desc: Unlock the key to automated deployment

items.label: AI Command Deploy
items.desc: One-click to put your code online

firebase.title: Infinite Storage
firebase.subtitle: Connect Google Firebase for scalable data storage

1.title: Create Project
1.desc: Firebase provides ready-to-use real-time database and authentication services.

3.title: AI Config Command
3.desc: Copy the command below to AI to complete database configuration:
3.text: I have obtained the Firebase config, please help me fill it in src/firebase.js and complete initialization to ensure the app can read/write data normally.

items.label: Initialize Project
items.desc: Establish a foothold in Google's cloud

items.label: Extract Config File
items.desc: Get credentials to connect your app

items.label: Inject AI Config
items.desc: Give your app data storage capability

domain.title: Your Identity
domain.subtitle: Custom domain is your digital asset
domain.providers_desc: We recommend these stable and reasonably priced providers:
domain.disclaimer: * All are direct official links, this project has no affiliation or commissions.

providers.name: Spaceship
providers.desc: New platform by Namecheap. Minimalist interface, extremely transparent pricing, great for .top, .xyz quick starts.

providers.name: Namecheap
providers.desc: Veteran provider, huge first year discounts (.xyz ~$1, .top ~$2), perfect for low cost experiments.

providers.name: Cloudflare
providers.desc: Sold at cost (no markup), lowest long-term holding cost. Perfectly integrated with Pages service.

connect_info.title: üîó How to connect?
connect_info.desc:
After purchase, go to Cloudflare Pages project settings ‚Üí <0>Custom Domains.
Cloudflare handles SSL and DNS automatically.

items.label: Resolve and Connect
items.desc: Point your domain to your website

success.title: Ready for Takeoff
success.subtitle: You are now a developer
success.canvas_desc:
You have the tools, the vision, and the AI.
From now on, you only need to do two things:

ask.title: 1. Ask
ask.desc: Describe your ideas in everyday language

giant.title: üåü Giants Walk With You
giant.text_1:
Never doubt yourself.
Standing behind you is the most powerful AI model in human history.
giant.text_2:
You are not coding alone. You have a world-class engineering team on standby 24/7.
Unleash your creativity, leave the rest to AI.

success.disclaimer: ‚ÑπÔ∏è This project is an unofficial guide for AI-assisted coding. We strongly recommend Google's Antigravity IDE as the pinnacle of current technology.
